sentences.en: Adult education is run in cooperation with the extra-mural departments of the universities.
sentences.cn: 成人教育是和大学对外教学部合办的。
通过调解, 友好合作关系得以确立.

sentences.en: He emphasised the wider issue of superpower cooperation.
sentences.cn: 他强调了超级大国合作这一更重要的议题。

sentences.en: Public cooperation is vital in the fight against terrorism.
sentences.cn: 公众的合作在抗击恐怖主义的斗争中至关重要.

sentences.en: The friendly cooperation between the two countries is growing with every passing day.
sentences.cn: 两国的友好合作关系日益发展.

sentences.en: The meeting discussed how to promote cooperation between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 会议讨论了如何促进两国的合作.

sentences.en: The meeting ended with a pledge to step up cooperation between the six states of the region.
sentences.cn: 会议以承诺加快这一地区六国间的合作而结束。

sentences.en: the need to strengthen international co-operation
The relations of friendly cooperation between our two countries are developing satisfactorily.
sentences.cn: 我们两国的友好合作关系正在令人满意地发展着.

sentences.en: The workers, in cooperation with the management , have increased output by 10 percent.
sentences.cn: 工人与工厂合作使产量增加10%.

sentences.en: There is the strong possibility that such cooperation will prove unworkable.
sentences.cn: 这种合作很有可能会行不通。

sentences.en: There was a wide gap between the views of the two statesmen on the bilateral cooperation.
sentences.cn: 对双方合作的问题,两位政治家各自所持的看法差距甚大.

sentences.en: They said they would give the police their full cooperation.
sentences.cn: 他们说他们愿意与警方通力合作。

sentences.en: They, too, would be likely to exact a high price for their cooperation.
sentences.cn: 他们也可能会为提供合作而索要高价。

sentences.en: While in the past we stressed aid, now we stress economic cooperation.
sentences.cn: 我们过去侧重提供援助, 现在强调经济合作.

trans.tran_en: when you work with someone to achieve something that you both want
